channel.title: Black Mesa VOX Still Have Missing Sounds.
channel.description: Hmmm..... I just noticed there is no Bizwarn sound, but it's in the sentences of the VOX in this game. There are other sounds too, but there's just too many.

item.title: Black Mesa VOX Still Have Missing Sounds.
item.dc:creator: Nevermore2790
item.description:
Here’s the bizwarn sound from the original Half-Life. It’s a more “high” pitched sound contrast to the buzwarn sound.

I also noticed the spelling of squad in the game files is incorrect. It’s spelled as sqaud in the game files.
bizwarn.zip (8.37 KB)

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa VOX Still Have Missing Sounds.

item.title: Black Mesa VOX Still Have Missing Sounds.
item.dc:creator: Snaiper
item.description:
Nevermore2790:

Bizwarn, not buzwarn.

oh heck, you’re right it is there, used 2 times and missing. Ahh

item.title: Black Mesa VOX Still Have Missing Sounds.
item.dc:creator: Snaiper
item.description:
What do you mean there’s no Buzwarn? I tested it with my custom sentences on a test map more than once: it works.
youtu.be/0FmLoO1LdRU

All of the VOX sounds that are in sentences.txt exist and work. There are even some unused VOX sounds.

Read full topic
